nodes.title: 9 Ways to Win a Hackathon... Without Coming in First Place
nodes.excerpt: Originally posted at  https://cult.honeypot.io/reads/how-to-win-a-hackathon From my experience at hackathons, I understand that it’s not…
nodes.description: To win first place at a hackathon, you need to combine multiple components... and that's not always possible. Here's how to make the most of your next hackathon without coming in 'first place'.

nodes.title: Building a command-line time tracker
nodes.excerpt:
I started working on a project and I wanted to track the time that I spend.
I searched and found desktop apps, websites, browser extensions…
nodes.description: This is my attempt to create a simple time tracker from the command line

nodes.title: What I learned from 35 Hackathons
nodes.excerpt: Update: Now count is at 40 Hackathons What is a Hackathon Hackathon - a usually competitive event in which people work in groups on software…
nodes.description: What I learned from 35 hackathons, why you should participate at hackathons, how to gain experience without a full-time job.
